ENTERPRISE KUBERNETES SERVICES

Training, Workshops, Architecture Consulting, Custom Development, and Integrations.


Make your cloud native transformation with Kubernetes and support from kubeify's team of experts.

Our Serivices

Explore Kubernetes

See if Kubernetes will work for you.

  • Session on Introduction to Kubernetes
  • Production-grade Kubernetes, on your hosting environment
  • CI/CD pipeline for an example application
  • Roadmap on how to move cloud apps to Kubernetes

Application Migration

Our engineers will help your team fully up and running with containers.

  • Roadmap for migration for "containerizing" complex applications.
  • Guided migration of legacy workloads to Containers
  • Production-grade Kubernetes (Bare meta, AWS or VMs)
  • Architecture and implementation of stateful services like data stores.
  • Production-grade logging, monitoring and disaster recovery

Managed Ops

We provide a production hardended cluster remotely managed by us bespoked to your needs.

  • Production-grade logging, monitoring, backup and disaster recovery
  • Security Patching/Upgrade Management
  • Remote monitoring with SLA, Incident escalations
  • SLA, incident escalation
  • Load testing, Security vulnerability assessment

Integration Services

We provide kubernetes addons to be more productive and agile.

  • CI/CD integrations
  • Secrets management
  • Workflow integrations
  • Enhanced intra-cluster security

Our Benfits

Architectural Consulting

Start with the groundwork needed for success with architectural consulting work for your new or existing Kubernetes platform and its hosted apps.

Implementation and Onboarding

Speed time to market for production Kubernetes clusters with our implementation services. Get the help you need to design and implement pure open source Kubernetes in any environment.

Custom Development

Fill the gaps that will exist between a standard open source Kubernetes cluster and one designed for you with custom development from seasoned system software engineers. Our engineers can help you get the distributed environment you need.

Integrations

Authentication, auditing, data services, and all your new and existing tools need to be integrated into the Kubernetes cluster. We have helped its Fortune 500 customers make the cloud native transformation for all their legacy systems.

Kubernetes Support on any Infrastructure

Get enterprise Kubernetes support for multi cloud environments:

  • Public Cloud – AWS, GCE/GKE, Azure, and more
  • Data Center – Install Kubernetes with Enterprise Toolkit and add support

Assessments

Determine your organization's technological maturity and gain actionable next steps:

  • Infrastructure apps and operational procedure review
  • Kubernetes readiness
  • Enterprise Toolkit readiness
